comments.body: I am not sure about this condition. I will test few scenarios and will comment back.

It just checks if the parent (datacenter) of the parent (e.g. `host`) is the specified datacenter. E.g. `folder.parent.parent.name == /DC01/host/folder`. I tested it several times with two different datacenters and host/vm folders.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +296,300 @@                if folder.name == folder_name and \
                   self.datacenter_folder_type[folder_type].childType == folder.childType and \
                   folder.parent.parent.name == datacenter_name:    # e.g. folder.parent.parent.name == /DC01/host/folder
                    return folder
